title: Samsung S7220 5.59 cm (2.2") 88 g Black
description:
Samsung S7220 5.59 cm (2.2") 88 g Black


SAMSUNG’s Ultra features a premium bar design derived from understatement; a slender form, slight curve and vibrant accent. Equally impressive is the industry’s best display. The mobile phone turns into an absolute eye-catcher when the photos taken with the 5-megapixel camera are shown on the 2.2" AMOLED display. ultimate design What you use everyday is extension of your personal style. You will benefit from sleek design and premium metal detail. Stylish users will be enticed by the simplistic yet sophisticated beauty of this bar. The compact size is portable, and won’t break a wrinkle when slipped into the pocket or bag. ultimate camera You can capture precious memories easily in the form of incredibly high quality photographs. Handy and easy to use, the embedded camera offers the user a convenient way to preserve their memories in digital form. Professional functions eliminate the need to carry a separate camera. music entertainment This mobile is always on hand, so you can enjoy convenient access to music without needing a second device. You will be able to experience a true MP3 like interface while listening to their favorite songs, all of which are accessible 24/7 thanks to ample microSD storage. connectivity You can access other networks and mobile peripherals, including mobile printers and stereo headsets, using Bluetooth 2.1 EDR or USB 2.0. Both services enables you to make speedy downloads of contents. In addition, HSDPA connectivity offers fast OTA connections for content downloading. ultimate display You will be impressed by the incredible quality of the display when viewing various applications. Brighter and more vibrant than any other mobile display, the AMOLED screen will enhance photo and video browsing as well as web-surfing. video recording Able to capture not just pictures but also videos. You will be able to preserve memories as they happen. You will enjoy playing back video, too, thanks to clear view of AMOLED. FM radio You can enjoy instant access to popular music and up-to-date information and news. You will appreciate the audio variety offered, which is all free-of-charge with no prior downloading necessary. RDS provides info like station identification, name of songs and radio show info so you always know what you’re listening to.

title: LG GD900 CRYSTAL 7.62 cm (3") 127 g
description:
LG GD900 CRYSTAL 7.62 cm (3") 127 g


UNWRAP THE FUTURE OF TOUCH LG are proud to unveil a new touch sensation, the LG GD900 Crystal. The transparent Crystal Touchpad is used like a mouse pad allowing you to glide, stroke and navigate with ease. Surfing the internet is effortless with high–speed browsing and it’s simple to edit photos taken with the 8 megapixel camera. Crystal Touchpad Crystal Touchpad delivers a more intuitive and controlled experience. The Crystal Touchpad uses Multi Finger Touch to allow you to zoom in and out, Mouse Mode to allow you to navigate a webpage without touching the screen as well as Finger Writing Recognition. 8 Megapixel Camera Enjoy clear, high-quality mobile phone pictures and advanced camera functions in every setting with a built-in 8 megapixel camera featuring Smartlight™ technology. 3 inch Full Touchscreen The LG GD900 Crystal offers a great viewing experience with a wide and sharp 3-inch WVGA screen. It is so easy to use with its super fast S Class UI allowing you to revolve the playful 3D cube to get into four different home screens – contacts, widgets, shortcuts and a customisable home screen. Gesture Shortcut When using the Gesture shortcut function on the LG GD900 Crystal, you can command 9 multitasking applications by drawing the designated characters on the Touchpad. You will be taken directly to your music, messages and many more.

title: Samsung S3550 5.08 cm (2") 79 g White
description:
Samsung S3550 5.08 cm (2") 79 g White


Stylish design, camera 2 megapixel, bluetooth stereo memory expandable to 30MB are characteristics differentiating of new Samsung Shark Slide. Comfortable Sleek, Curvilinear Chic Curvilinear shapes updates the mobile form with twists and curves. Patterned metallic back cover enforces the premium look of the slider. Compact size offers sleek portability and ergonomic comfort The Paragon of the Mobile User Experience 3 soft keys adopt to your needs, helping you intuitively navigate through the mobile. Optimised scenarios streamline navigation paths for commonly used functions such as message composition. Effective layout increases visibility and readability of the menu screens Your Mobile Social Life Easily share your pictures with your online social communities – instant uploads of photos to your favourite social networking sites. Multi instant messenger consolidates friends lists from various IM services into one unified contact list for easy access on the go.
